Class.name: sc.plugin
Class.Description: [s]ource [c]ontrol plugin for InterSystems Cach√© (testing in v.2016.1) Just export or import to/from filesystem. Nothing more.

Parameter.name: Flags
Parameter.Description:
Just sync.
  • 1 : Present dialog on check in
  • 2 : Present dialog on check out
  • 3 : Ask to add new item to source control
  • 4 : Ask to remove deleted item from source control

Method.name: OnBeforeLoad
Method.Description: Import the file from the external format into Cache. This is called before the actual load of data to give the chance to load the item from an external format.

Method.name: OnAfterCompile
Method.Description: Called when Studio compile code and some parts of code may be changed for example - storage scheme

Method.name: install
Method.Implementation: s sc = ##class(%Studio.SourceControl.Interface).SourceControlClassSet( $classname(), ns ) s sc = sc && ##class(sc.options).init() Q sc
